name: Semma
body:
# semma
# The dynamic checkbox tree
```
	var data = [
	    {child:'o1',text:'Option 1'},
	    {parent:'o1',child:'o1',text:'Option 1.1'},
	    {parent:'o1',child:'o2',text:'Option 1.2'},
	    {parent:'o1-o2',child:'o1',text:'Option 1.2.1'},
	    {parent:'o1-o2',child:'o2',text:'Option 1.2.2'},
	    {child:'o2',text:'Option 2'},
	    {parent:'o2',child:'o1',text:'Option 2.1'},
	    {parent:'o2',child:'o2',text:'Option 2.2'},
	    {parent:'o2-o2',child:'o1',text:'Option 2.2.1'},
	    {parent:'o2-o2',child:'o2',text:'Option 2.2.2'}
	  ];
```
![Semma list](http://s32.postimg.org/ca1wb6iol/semma_list.png)

# Usage

```
var Options= new Stemma(mount,{
    data:data
});
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
